title: Overview
description: Version control is a system that tracks changes to files over time, allowing you to manage and revert changes, track project history, and collaborate effectively. In longitudinal data science, it is essential for ensuring reproducibility and transparent analysis.

title: Overview
description: Choosing the right data format is crucial for managing, storing, and analyzing longitudinal data efficiently. Formats like Apache Parquet and Arrow offer significant advantages in terms of performance, scalability, and interoperability.
